title: TELESIN Aluminum Side Door Cover Battery Lid for GoPro Hero 9, Hero 10, Hero 11 Cameras GP-CLC-902
description:
The Elgato Facecam broadcasts and records stunning, lifelike videos with smooth movement and crisp detail in Full HD 1080p at 60 fps. It features a Sony STARVIS CMOS sensor that captures incredible detail with minimal noise. Plus, the ultra-fast processor intelligently processes data for superb video quality. And with manual settings, you get exactly the look you want, just like with an SLR camera.

And with an 82Â° field of view, get up close and personal or leave your surroundings in the frame.
